data: It is, of course, possible, perhaps even probable, that somewhere on this green earth there may be finer golf links or a more attractive clubhouse than those at Headland Harbor, but never hope to wring such an admission from any one of the summer colony who spend their mid-year at that particular portion of the Maine coast.
browsing: crime/mystery|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: crime, thrillers and mystery|category: novels|category: american literature
